entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain inland before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain inland early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
